Articles.Content:
Pros: Superman

Cons: Kryptonite

Have the abilities of a unicorn.

Pros: DE MAGICKS.

Cons: Your horn could hurt somebody.

Have the ability to regenerate like a Time Lord.

Pros: Regeneration

Cons: Daleks

The ability to calculate your TWR, delta v, and mass in 1 second without using mechjeb.

Pros: be slightly better at K.S.P.

Cons: "Ignorance is bliss"-Thomas Gray

Have anime eyes and voice.

Pros: None

Cons: I hate anime

Be able to do anything and be invincible, and no one can do anything about it.

Pros: I can do anything

Cons: Absolute power corrupts absolutely.

The ability to change anyone's hairstyle with your mind.

Pros: Ability to make everyone look like idiots.

Cons: Pressured to become a hairdresser for the rest of your life.

The ability to have dreams like they did in Inception.

Pros: Fall asleep in a dream ten times whenever you need time to think.

Cons: Your nightmares last forever.

The ability to teleport ten feet in any direction.

Pros: you can teleport

Cons: you can't use it to get free travel

the ability the people around me smarter without any negative effects to myself

Pro: No idiots annoying you

Con: You can be a annoying idiot for others

The ability to keep a constant body temperature of 36 C without using nutrients and calories.

Pro: No fever, hypothermia, etc.

Con: Heat-seeking missiles are out for your blood in winter.

Type at 1000 words a minute.

Pro: everyone's favorite secretary.

Cons: IT staff tired of replacing your keyboards.

The ability to walk through walls

Pro: awesome skill

Con: might get stuck

Ability to fly!

Pro: Flying

Cons: FBI

The ability to live in vacuum with no suit.

Pro: Space Space Space

Con: No propulsion, you could only fart a bit.

The ability to turn your thoughts into any computer code language, making yourself the best coder of the world.

Pro: I'd be rich.

Con: Seriously, who wants to be Mike Zuckerberg? It's lonely at the top.

The ability to turn your hands into any object you can see.

Pros: Be the T-1000

Cons: Everyone would be afraid to hug you.

The ability to fly at 1 mile per hour.

Pro: you can fly

Con: birds will land on you as you fly.

The ability to become a tank.

Pro: Blowin' stuff up.

Con: Stupid RPGs.

Your bones are made from titanium.

Pros: You are virtually unbreakable.

Cons: Damn this is heavy!

The ability to regrow lost limbs.

Pro: Entering a machete fight *unarmed* XD.

Con: Who will clean up the blood?

The ability to pluck out your eyeballs and still see through them.

Pros: see around stuff

Cons: you are touching your eyes with dirty hands.

The ability to land on a planet with no fuel.

Pros: Fuel efficiency.

Cons: How you gonna takeoff?

The ability to create or destroy energy.

Pros: I GOT THE POWER!

Cons: I LOST THE POWER!

The ability to instantly understand how any machine works, see how it could be improved, see how to fix broken machines, etc.

Pros: Best mechanic ever

Cons: Improving technology too fast is dangerous.

The ability to blink and be completely rested.
